title: Support main looking for duo or flex
body:
Hey guys, 

I usually play one or 2 games a night after work and some during the weekend - i play support champs like naut and zyra and I'm kinda tired that whenever i start goign up in ranks i end up playing with either people who blatantly said they don't ADC or play the position they got but they don't want to dodge queue or just simply feed.

Any team or player that wants to make an effort and play for the points as well as for fun?

Chees, 
TWH

replies.body:
interested 
IGN: LilMil
Jinx Vayne Main
hope it goes well
Thansk for the add :D we can play tomorrow night if you're keen :D
Add me (L3yum) ill play with you. Maining adc at the moment and am in promos to B3

Currently B5 after being B3  - so yeah, low rank, but I wanna play with people who understand the game is not about chasing people in the jungle 4 v 2 while your turrets at base are being destroyed by the 3 other people from the opposite team
